name: @lunatlazur/rpgmakermz-types
description: RPGツクールMZのコアスクリプトをTypeScriptで扱うための型定義ファイルです。
author: Taku Aoi

scripts.check: npm run extract-structure && npm run validate-types
scripts.check:all: npm run check && npm run test:types
scripts.analyze:all: npm run extract-structure && npm run diff-types
